text: Blackwood is a 1976 Canadian short documentary film about Newfoundland artist David Blackwood, directed by Tony Ianzelo and Andy Thomson. Narration is provided by Gordon Pinsent. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==References== ==External links== * *Watch Blackwood at NFB.ca Category:1976 films Category:1976 short films Category:1976 documentary films Category:Canadian films Category:Canadian short documentary films Category:Culture of Newfoundland and Labrador Category:Documentary films about visual artists Category:English-language films Category:Films directed by Tony Ianzelo Category:Films set in Newfoundland and Labrador Category:Films produced by Tom Daly Category:Films produced by Colin Low (filmmaker) Category:National Film Board of Canada documentaries Category:National Film Board of Canada short films Category:Works about Newfoundland and Labrador
title: Blackwood (film)
